channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed

item.title: Fed holds rates steady and notes progress on inflation
item.description: Federal Reserve officials held short-term interest rates steady, but indicated that inflation is getting closer to its 2% target.

item.title: Bank of England cuts interest rates for first time in over four years: Live updates
item.description: The central bank's decision was viewed by markets as being on a knife-edge despite inflation reaching target.

item.description: Eli Lilly plans to submit the results to the FDA and other regulators later this year.

item.title: Biogen beats expectations, hikes outlook as Alzheimer's drug Leqembi and other new products gain traction
item.description: Uptake of Biogen's breakthrough Alzheimer's drug, Leqembi, appears to be picking up, with roughly $40 million in sales for the quarter.

item.title: S&P 500 futures rise after Meta posts quarterly beat: Live updates
item.description: Stock futures rose Thursday as investors weighed the latest corporate earnings reports, including strong results from Meta Platforms.

item.title: Moderna stock falls more than 10% as it slashes guidance on low EU sales, tough U.S. vaccine market
item.description: Moderna now expects 2024 product revenue to come in between $3 billion and $3.5 billion, down from a previous guidance of $4 billion.

item.title: Israeli military says it killed Hamas armed wing leader Mohammed Deif in Gaza airstrike last month
item.description: Israel's military on Thursday said it killed the chief of Hamas' military wing, Mohammed Deif, in an airstrike in July.
